name: picnic.
description:
You are Keko, on a quest to share club sandwiches with you friend Mr. Raccoon at the top of the hill.  Burrow, jump, and paraglide your way to the top, enjoy the scenery, hang out with friends ... enjoy your sandwich.

WASD or Arrows = Move

Space or Left mouse = Burrow, Jump, Paraglide

E key or Right Mouse = Talk with Mr. Raccoon
